welcome_message_body: Welcome to Habikino, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, traditional temples, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: ビッグジョー 藤井寺店
restaurants.description: ビッグジョー 藤井寺店 is a steakhouse located in 藤井寺市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ITM Free WiFi' and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but registration is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
